skills.name: ABSORB VIGOR
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• Increase ATK of allies for 2 turns if the enemy has a Shield.

skills.name: HEDGED BET
desc: • Deal physical damage to all enemies that increases based on your MISSING HP.
• Remove all Immunity and Vanish effects, including Golden effects, from all enemies if at 75% HP or below.
• Inflict up to 3 Marks and 3 Perfect Bleeds on each enemy for 2 turns.
• 50% Chance to gain an Extra Turn.
• Take 35% of CURRENT HP as True Damage.
• Cannot fall below 1 HP while using this skill.

skills.name: SOUL SACRIFICE
desc: • Deals physical and magic damage to all enemies.
